jde.wizards

Class AbstractClassFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • jde.wizards.MethodFactory
      • jde.wizards.InterfaceFactory
        • jde.wizards.AbstractClassFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassRegistry

    public class AbstractClassFactory
extends InterfaceFactory
    Defines a factory for creating skeleton implementations of the abstract methods of Abstract Java classes. The factory can be invoked from the command line or from another program. This class extends the interface factory to handle Abstract classes Copyright (c) Javier Lopez 2001. All Rights Reserved. AbstractClassFactory is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2, or (at your option) any later version. AbstractClassFactory is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. To obtain a copy of the GNU General Public License write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.7 $
    Author:
    Javier Lopez

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(java.lang.String argAbstracClassName)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    jde.wizards.NotAnAbstractClassException
        Generates signatures based on introspection of the specified interface. Strips package specifiers from generated signatures.
        Overrides:
        process in class InterfaceFactory
        Parameters:
        argAbstracClassName - the abstract class to process for signatures.
        Throws:
        jde.wizards.NotAnAbstractClassException - the requested class isn't an abstract class
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - the requested class cannot be loaded

      • process

        public void process(java.lang.String name,
           boolean truncate)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    jde.wizards.NotAnAbstractClassException
        Generates signatures based on introspection of the specified class.
        Overrides:
        process in class InterfaceFactory
        Parameters:
        name - the abstract class to process for signatures.
        truncate - toggles truncation of package specifiers in signatures.
        Throws:
        jde.wizards.NotAnAbstractClassException - the requested class isn't an abstract class
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - the requested class cannot be loaded

      • getImportedClasses

        public static void getImportedClasses()

      • makeAbstractClassExpression

        public static void makeAbstractClassExpression(java.lang.String name,
                               boolean truncate)
        Makes an implementation of the abstract methods of an abstract class. This method delegates the creation of the implementation to makeAbstractClassInternal.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of abstract class to be implemented.
        truncate - If true, truncate package specifier when generating code.
